definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: The amphiphilic block copolymers can self-assemble into micelles in a solvent that is selective for one of their constituents.
sentences.chinese: 兩親嵌段共聚物在選擇性溶劑中能自組裝成膠束。
